titleInfo.title: On QCD thermodynamics with improved actions

mods.abstract: We discuss recent advances in the calculation of thermodynamic observables using improved actions. In particular, we discuss the calculation of the equation of state of the SU(3) gauge theory, the critical temperature in units of the string tension, the surface tension and the latent heat at the deconfinement transition. We also present first results from a calculation of the equation of state for four-flavour QCD using an (3(a(2)) improved staggered fermion action and discuss possible further improvements of the staggered fermion action.
